name: concussion
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
temporary damage to the brain caused by a fall or hit on the head or by violent shaking: I think he may have had a concussion. Many patients with concussion are not seen by a neuropsychologist. He was taken to hospital suffering from concussion.UK I would rather injure an arm or leg than get concussion.
More examplesFewer examplesIn the U.S., an estimated 150,000 kids suffer a sports-related concussion each year. Repeated concussions could cause degenerative brain disease.There should be a rule that any player who sustains a concussion cannot return to play that day.
